William Henry Alonzo visits the guards at Blair Gate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three men, two dressed in uniforms, sit in a room next to a heater.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gatehouses; Guardhouses; Guards; Interiors; Internal security; Security checkpoints
Alonzo, William Henry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Alonzo, 82, lived outside Blair Gate and visited with guards on duty at the gate.
